metadata.title: Breaking News: Threads Test 1 Unleashed
metadata.excerpt:
Prompt no último slide.

silhouette walking portrait, side profile figure, long exposure motion blur, strong ghost trail and smear, stretched legs blur, blurred bag swinging, minimal subject details, high contrast silhouette, intense red orange gradient background, warm glow halo behind subject, soft haze, slight bloom, cinematic abstract editorial, dreamy motion, analog film feel, subtle grain, smooth gradient, dramatic backlight

#midjourneyprompt #midjourneyrawstyle #aiportraitphotography

metadata.title: Revolutionizing Coding Insights: Twitter's Claude Code Update
metadata.excerpt:
We've added a new command to Claude Code called /insights 

When you run it, Claude Code will read your message history from the past month. It'll summarize your projects, how you use Claude Code, and give suggestions on how to improve your workflow.

metadata.title: Introducing Voxtral Transcribe 2: Revolutionizing Speech-to-Text Models
metadata.excerpt: Precision diarization, real-time transcription, and a new audio playground.
